message: Let's start fair.  I'm offering you 40% of the money.  We can discuss further if you'd like.
You were too generous, now it's my turn to make a counteroffer. I'll give you a smaller share, but I think this is a fairer split.
Let's split it evenly. We both lose value with every round, so a fair split makes the most sense right now.
I'm not ready to split it evenly yet. I think I can do better than that.
Let's get closer to a fair split.  I'm willing to take a bit less than a 50/50 split to get this deal done.
